title: Avenge the Ironhands
content: can agree to his plan to blow up Steel Watch Foundry with Runepowder Bomb. You need to Infiltrate the Lower level of the Steel Watch Foundary to blow up the assembly. However, if you managed to save Gondians in Iron Throne (Quest Save the Gondians), you can ask Zanner Toobin to blow the Foundary, save the Runepowder Bomb for future battles. You can enter the the Steel Watch Foundry (X:-236 Y:-180) by open the front gates. Head inside and reach the main door (X:-292 Y:-172) you will need to pass
